item.title: Why wait? Adopt hugo for Static Site Generation
item.description: Why… oh why… why did I wait so long? I’ve been talking about switching to a static site generator for years, since jekyllrb started gaining popularity. I understood the benefits, but I had no compelling reason to switch… (sort of how I resisted git for a few years because svn worked well enough) But who wants a WordPress site? Well, ok, maybe you are using 12 plugins and doing fancy stuff.
